font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 笨蛋：a stupid or unimaginative person
【例】At one time his school headmaster called him a dullard.
【近】 moron, simpleton, idiot, fool
【反】 wit 机智的人；genius 天才
【派】 dull adj. 愚笨的
